This Paper Bracelet Is Helping Parents Protect Their Children 
Forbes Friday 23rd October, 2015 
.rnrnTo underscore the value of location-based marketing, Khan shared what skincare and sunscreen company Nivea is up to. The company has established a strong brand as a product that protects children from the sun and sunburn, but they wanted to identify other opportunities they could address by extending this brand promise.
